data.title: Clark Gable's Honeymoon Room, Oatman, Arizona
data.meta_description: On March 29, 1939 Clark Gable married his third wife actress Carole Lombard in nearby Kingman and spent their wedding night at the Oatman Hotel, in the mining town of Oatman, Arizona.The couple often returned to the hotel for the peace and solitude it afforded them. Clark was known to spend many a night playing poker with some of the miners. Their room can still be seen by visitors today. Carole Lombard was killed in a TWA plane crash in January 1942. Clark Gable died in November 1960 following a heart attack. October 2006
